EXT_color_buffer_half_float.summary: The EXT_color_buffer_half_float extension is part of the WebGL API and adds the ability to render to 16-bit floating-point color buffers.

remarks.para: WebGL extensions are available using the method. For more information, see also Using Extensions in the WebGL tutorial.

blockquote.para: This extension is available to both, {{domxref("WebGLRenderingContext", "WebGL1", "", 1)}} and {{domxref("WebGL2RenderingContext", "WebGL2", "", 1)}} contexts. On WebGL 2, it's an alternative to using the extension on platforms that support 16-bit floating point render targets but not 32-bit floating point render targets.
The extension implicitly enables this extension.
